definition: the act of tying or binding things together
details:
noun
- the act of tying or binding things together
= synonyms: tying
- something used to tie or bind
= synonyms: binder
- thread used by surgeons to bind a vessel so as to constrict the flow of blood
- a metal band used to attach a reed to the mouthpiece of a clarinet or saxophone
= example: a metal band used to attach a reed to the mouthpiece of a clarinet or saxophone
- character consisting of two or more letters combined into one
= example: character consisting of two or more letters combined into one
- a group of musical notes connected by a slur
= example: a group of musical notes connected by a slur
